meaning: (⇒ funny유의어) ▶ an interesting book 재미있는 책 ▶ 《interesting+interesting·ly interesting·ness
details:
in·ter·est·ing〔ínt∂rəstiy, -tərèst-〕 a. 흥미있는, 재미있는(⇒ funny1 [유의어])
▶ an interesting book 재미있는 책
▶ 《interesting+to do》 Birds are interesting to watch.=It is interesting to watch birds. 조류 관찰은 재미있다.
in an interesting condition[situation, state] 《고어》 임신하여
interesting·ly ad. interesting·ness n.
